definition: parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear

sentences.english: Our parents didn't want us to marry, so we eloped .
sentences.chinese: 我們的父母親不同意我們結婚，所以我們便私奔。

sentences.english: Almost all share physical traits and mannerisms with their parents.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎所有孩子都分享他們的父母親的身體特徵和習性。

sentences.english: He takes his parents' advice as a breeze passing by.
sentences.chinese: 他將父母親的話當耳邊風。

sentences.english: I grew up on a farm, helping my parents.
sentences.chinese: 我在農場長大，幫我父母親分擔農務。

sentences.english: Parents should work together as efficiently as two bookends.
sentences.chinese: 父母親應合作無間，如同兩個書檔使書穩立不搖。

sentences.english: 'I want to be a sailor and go to sea. 'I told my mother and father.
sentences.chinese: “我想成爲一名水手去航行，”我告訴父母親。

sentences.english: Yang Ling and her parents live in a new house now.
sentences.chinese: 楊玲和她的父母親住進一戶新房子。

sentences.english: Even Christian families are not without mother and daughter-in-law problems.
sentences.chinese: 許多年輕基督徒婚後也都與父母親住在一起。

sentences.english: In the past, my parents during the war, kept everything.
sentences.chinese: 在過去，我父母親在戰爭中保持每一樣東西。

sentences.english: His taking to drugs was a great grief to his parents.
sentences.chinese: 他的吸毒成癮是他父母親一大傷心事。

sentences.english: McGovern’s parents tried to offer a meal to any poor person who came by.
sentences.chinese: 麥戈文的父母親儘量爲任何登門的窮人提供一餐飯。

sentences.english: God and my parents are waiting impatiently for me.
sentences.chinese: 上帝和我的父母親正在那裏等着我。

sentences.english: His parents will reprimand him when he shows them his report card.
sentences.chinese: 當他把分數單交給父母親看時，他們將嚴厲申斥他。

sentences.english: This would help harried parents who already have their hands full.
sentences.chinese: 這對那些雙手都拿着東西的父母親來說很有幫助。

sentences.english: His parents and brother were killed in the crash.
sentences.chinese: 他同行的父母親兄弟都在空難中喪生。

sentences.english: The children don't dare(to)make a sound while their parents are sleeping.
sentences.chinese: 父母親睡覺的時候，孩子們都不敢吱聲。

definition: a relative (i.e. family relation)/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
the younger generation/those who come after
